short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed up your job hunt with our all in one job search CRM. Free sign up.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Conneer Job Tracker CRM: Streamline Your Job Search

Take control of your job search with Conneer Job Tracker CRM, the ultimate tool designed to help you organize, track, and accelerate your job hunting process. This intuitive Chrome extension allows you to:

Organize Your Applications: Keep track of all your job applications in one place. Sort by date, status, and priority to maintain an organized view of your job search journey.

Monitor Progress: Easily update the status of each application, from initial application to interviews and offers. Set reminders for follow-ups and deadlines to ensure no opportunity slips through the cracks.

Gain Insights: Leverage analytics to understand your job search patterns and improve your application strategies. Identify which types of roles and industries are yielding better results.

Streamline Networking: Manage professional contacts and network interactions directly within the CRM. Log notes from conversations and link them to specific job applications or opportunities.

Perfect for job seekers at all levels, Conneer Job Tracker CRM helps you maintain a clear and focused approach to your job search, increasing your efficiency and success rate. Get started today and transform how you find your next great opportunity!
